spec.name: Borj Es Sirat
spec.description: Borj Sirat is a bastion located at the western end of Rabat's sea wall, built on a cliff overlooking the Atlantic Ocean in 1775â€“1776 by the English renegade Ahmed El Inglizi during the reign of Mohammed III. It served as part of the coastal defense system.

timeline.title: Construction
timeline.description: Built by Ahmed El Inglizi in 1775-1776 during the reign of Mohammed III.
